text: The pizza here was out of this world! The menu had really cool art on it and it was a really wonderful dining experience. If you're visiting Williamsburg I would highly recommend stopping here. They also allowed dogs on the patio!

name: Taylor B
text: Very good pizza and food. Great service. Fun atmosphere.

name: Win Iden
text: The pizza was fine, good but not great. Steak & cheese hoagie was awful. Cold roll, not toasted, with a miniscule amount of meat. Cheese was imperceptible, one slice of tomato per half, came to the table barely above room temperature. Really disappointing. Two stars because the pretzel appetizer was really good.

name: Rebekah Kimble
text: This location of Mellow Mushroom is probably the best we've been to!  Bless the server who took care of our 9 party of mostly kids under 5.  Service and Food were both A++

text: I had pretty much given up on Mellow Mushroom until we stopped at this one. I live in Fayetteville NC and I was tired of poor service and bad food. This location reminded me why I love Mellow Mushroom!

name: Diego Fuentes
text: Pizza is fairly priced for what you get. The wings are nicely made too! Overall a nice experience.

text: It would have been better had they had their full menu.

text: We were able to get a big table on a Saturday evening right away. My kids loved the environment, and I did too. I really wanted to sit outside , it looked very inviting. Next time I will. The pizza was phenomenal. Will be back.

text: Great food and service, like every other Mellow Mushroom we've been to.  As always, try there pretzel bites with beer cheese!  They are currently offering a great holiday drink, Holiday Jingle, it's sweet, flavorful, and put you in that holiday cheer.

name: Ryan L
text: Ceasar pizza is awesome!

name: Amy Luna
text: Great food. Great service. Great atmosphere! The great white pizza is amazing!! You have to eat here!!! My favorite pizza in town!

name: Henry Whelchel
text: Mellow Mushroom makes a superior crust. Maybe not like a lot of places in New York City, but still very very good. This location has great service and we found that everything was delicious and on time.

name: Michelle Ruggieri
text: Service was excellent. Really enjoyed the calzone. My family also enjoyed their sandwiches. Would definitely return!

name: Adam Onnebane
text: It's a shame to say it, but this location had a completely different feel, walking in the door and at the table, then other locations. Pizza was great as always, but... The building and staff had no flavor. Felt like a regular restaurant. But the food was great as always!

text: This is easily one of our favorite places to eat as a vegan family. My wife, kids and myself can all easily choose something. My favorite is the Follow You're Heart vegan cheese, mushroom, and buffalo tofu calzone!

text: Great pizza, great atmosphere,  attentive staff and a large selection of beers to choose from, many of which are local offerings make this a place worth trying.

text: Great pizza place just outside the historic area . Tons of topping choices, and a very good beer selection. Atmosphere is fun yet relaxed. Service was friendly, helpful, and prompt! The perfect place to end a long day of exploring!

name: Karen Franco
text: Food was great! Service too!

text: I'm normally hesitant getting pizza south of New York but when you are in Williamsburg,VA go to the Mellow Mushroom. Bill Kerpka

name: John W
text: The food is a bit unique and very good. Serve staff are nice and attentive. Sometimes you will have to wait a bit to have the food served. It is a fun and relaxed atmosphere with a well done interior. There is a nice place to sit outside as well.

name: Joanne Tuin
text: This place is the BOMB! I ate at one in St. Augustine last spring for the first time and fell in love with their pizza. Huge selection of pizza varieties and create your own plus local beer.

name: Malery Thompson
text: This place is great! Food tastes great and toppings were all fresh. We had the House special and a ceasar salad. Our kids loved their kids pizzas. Prices are very reasonable for the quality. Service was great! Restaurant was clean, plenty of seating and music selection was nice. Highly recommend Mellow Mushroom!

name: Tracy Cossabone
text: Fatima was a wonderful server and the food was delicious.  That buffalo chicken dip was awesome!

name: Pife81
text: Pizza was decent. Service was good. Wait time is very long!

text: This pizza was wonderful. The crust was fresh and the toppings were as well. The combinations available were tasteful. We had the Holy Shiitake pizza and I was in heaven. ‚Ä¶More
